example_sentence_italian: Ho prenotato un albergo per il weekend.
example_sentence_english: I booked a hotel for the weekend.

example_sentence_italian: Vorrei un albergo vicino alla stazione.
example_sentence_english: I would like a hotel near the station.

example_sentence_italian: L'albergo ha una vista sul mare.
example_sentence_english: The hotel has a sea view.

example_sentence_italian: Gli alberghi della città sono occupati.
Ho letto recensioni degli alberghi locali.
example_sentence_english: I read reviews of some local hotels.
The location of the hotel is excellent.

example_sentence_italian: Vado all'albergo per ritirare le chiavi.
example_sentence_english: I go to the hotel to pick up the keys.

example_sentence_italian: Spedisco materiale agli alberghi della zona.
example_sentence_english: I send materials to the area's hotels.

example_sentence_italian: I rifiuti provengono dagli alberghi vicini.
example_sentence_english: The waste comes from the nearby hotels.

example_sentence_italian: La conferenza si svolge nell'albergo centrale.
example_sentence_english: The conference takes place in the central hotel.

example_sentence_italian: Si tengono eventi negli alberghi del porto.
example_sentence_english: Events are held in the port's hotels.
There is a bright sign on the hotel.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato informazioni sugli alberghi della zona.
example_sentence_english: I found information about the area's hotels.

example_sentence_italian: Parlo con l'albergo per confermare la prenotazione.
example_sentence_english: I speak with the hotel to confirm the reservation.
Col albergo vicino abbiamo un accordo speciale.
column14: With the nearby hotel we have a special agreement.

example_sentence_italian: Collaboriamo con gli alberghi della regione.
example_sentence_english: We collaborate with the region's hotels.

notes: alternative contraction to 'con gli'; less used before vowel
example_sentence_english: With the nearby hotels we organize tours.
